Package solutions.shapes

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
solutions.shapes.Shape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Shape>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, Cube, Cylinder
public abstract class Shape extends Object implements Comparable<Shape>
Solution for third assignment. This is base class for all 3D figures.
